formattedAddress: 427 Fort Washington Ave B, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 427 Fort Washington Ave B, New York, NY 10033-3540, USA

originalText.text:
Wow, get ye to the dentist! I usually have between negative and slightly okay experiences at the dentist. Dr.Bloom had time for a Saturday emergency repair. He’s excellent, told interesting stories while doing the potentially painful or uncomfortable parts and made the time go by quickly.  The repair was better and quicker than any I had gotten done in my life. And frankly cost much less than some of those emergency/weekend places (who sometimes charge you just to walk in the door).
I’d highly recommend Dr.Bloom. He’s a real NYC guy and will help you out. As a bonus, the staff at the front desk was very friendly and effective.

originalText.text: Dr. Bloom is a lovely guy and terrific dentist.  He is very caring and friendly.  I moved four years ago but still go back to see him.  He tries to avoid doing X-rays if he can, because he cares about his patients' overall health, unlike dentists who gladly take pictures for which they get paid.  Downsides?  The office is still uncomputerized(!), which is charming in a way but also absurdly outdated.  Also, the good doctor's friendly chatting with patients doesn't always work if you're in a rush.  But overall, he's excellent, professional, and friendly.  Absolutely recommend, and strongly so.

originalText.text: After several unsuccessful attempts with local dentists to get dentures for my mother, we found Dr Bloom. Immediately, I could tell his approach was professional, thorough and with great knowledge and skill. After 2 years of pain and difficulty eating, my mother was able to have a well fitting denture and is pain free. We are eternally grateful for his help and strongly recommend him for all dental needs.

originalText.text:
Dr. Bloom is an ethical, professional, experienced dentist,whose work is excellent.
He is one of those rare dentists who will accommodate his patients in an emergency dental situation. I recommended him without reserve.

originalText.text: Dr Howard Bloom of Ft Washington office in Manhattan, is not only an ethical, respected medical practioner, but also a pillar of the community. His business has remained a constant in this neighborhood, despite ever-changing vendors and familiar faces. He has always been courteous and his facility clean. I have been a patient for over 25years. Let research speak for itself.
